data: I’m Sayed Moataz, a passionate Flutter Developer with extensive experience building high-quality, scalable mobile applications for real estate, e-commerce, and educational platforms. With a strong foundation in clean architecture, state management (Bloc, Cubit, Provider, GetX), and API integration, I craft responsive, user-friendly apps that prioritize performance and accessibility. My work includes developing feature-rich apps, where I integrated tools like Firebase, Google Maps, and Branch.io to deliver seamless user experiences across iOS and Android. I thrive in collaborative, agile environments, leveraging tools like Jira, Slack, and Git to work effectively with cross-functional teams worldwide. My commitment to clean code and modular design ensures maintainable, future-proof applications. Beyond coding, I’m an active contributor to the Flutter community on GitHub and Stack Overflow, where I’ve earned over 400 reputation points for helping others solve complex challenges. With a BA degree from Helwan University’s Faculty of Computers and Artificial Intelligence, I bring a blend of technical expertise and creative problem-solving to every project. Whether it’s implementing real-time data streams or optimizing app performance, I’m driven by a passion for creating impactful digital solutions. Explore my projects to see my work in action, or feel free to reach out to discuss how I can contribute to your next big idea!
